DataElement.preferredName: Computed Tomography within 21 days Prior To Treatment Administered Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator to signify whether the subject had a CT scan within 21 days prior to treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Computed Tomography 21 days Prior To Treatment Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the sampling/removal of lymph nodes draining the tumor using a special sampling technique._Earlier in time or order. (NCI)_Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._Clinical manifestations that can be either objective when observed by a physician, or subjective when perceived by the patient._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::21_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A series of detailed pictures of areas inside the body; the pictures are created by a computer linked to an x-ray machine.

Concepts.definition: A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis.

Property.preferredName: Integer::21 Day Prior To Therapeutic Procedure Administered
Property.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::21:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.       :Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has undergone CT imaging with
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has undergone CT imaging within 21 days prior to treatment as part of routine care.
